paper_metadata.title: BRCA-associated hereditary male cancers: can gender affect the prevalence and spectrum of germline pathogenic variants?
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for BRCA2, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The BRCA2 variant named c.4284dup (p.Gln1429fs) has been observed in both melanoma and MBC.

functional_data.summary: Frameshift variant leading to truncated protein.

variants.population_frequency: Low frequency rates (0.82% in women with breast and/or ovarian cancer).
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on family history and clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: Variant detected in multiple patients with different cancer types.
key_quotes: The BRCA2 variant named c.4284dup (p.Gln1429fs) has been observed in both melanoma and MBC.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Another BRCA2 variant named c.7681C>T (p.Gln2561Ter) was present in one individual with MBC and one with PC.
Another BRCA2 variant named c.7681C>T (p.Gln2561Ter) was present in one individual with MBC and one with PC.

functional_data.summary: Nonsense variant leading to truncated protein.

variants.population_frequency: Low frequency rates (1.03% in women with breast and/or ovarian cancer).
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on family history and clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: Variant detected in multiple patients with different cancer types.
key_quotes: Another BRCA2 variant named c.7681C>T (p.Gln2561Ter) was present in one individual with MBC and one with PC.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The BRCA2 variants named c.6078_6079del (p.Glu2028fs) have been detected each in two different MBC patients.
The BRCA2 variants named c.6078_6079del (p.Glu2028fs) have been detected each in two different MBC patients.

functional_data.summary: Frameshift variant leading to truncated protein.

variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on family history and clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: Variant detected in multiple patients with MBC.
key_quotes: The BRCA2 variants named c.6078_6079del (p.Glu2028fs) have been detected each in two different MBC patients.

tables_processed.table_caption: Germline BRCA PVs/LPVs harbored by patients with MBC, PCa, PC or melanoma.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants and penetrance data were extracted.
